WorkItem.ClosedComment: This isn't a bug in the PHPExcel library, so shouldn't be posted to the issues log; it's a problem with your not understanding how to do something in PHPExcel, so it should be posted to the discussion forum. And please clarify exactly what data you have and what you're trying to do with it: I can't tell if you're trying to store data in an Excel workbook or read it from an Excel workbook.
WorkItem.Description: Hi there, I've got some problem when I using the data from arrays like --> $data[$i] in a loop , the excel exported will be Error and all the data not in the cell poperly, but testing with e.g. $data[1], $data[2], the data can be shown, and also in the cell. Anyone know what is the problem? Thank you very much!!
